EmailTemplate.description: Used as an auto-response for the internal application support process
EmailTemplate.name: Internal Email to Ticket
EmailTemplate.subject: Citron Hygiene: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} -{!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Citron Hygiene. Ticket # {!Case.CaseNumber} "{!Case.Subject}" has been created and a Customer Success agent will contact you shortly.
Should you require any additional information regarding this ticket, please reply to this e-mail.
If you would like to submit a new request, please send an e-mail to customersuccess@citronhygiene.com. To place a product order, please send an email to orders@citronhygiene.com.
Thank you, Citron Hygiene Customer Success Department {!Case.Thread_Id}
